A recent regulatory requirement has the potential to affect an organization’s use of a third party to supply outsourced business services. Which of the following is the BEST course of action?

A. Identify compensating controls. (Possible but you still first need to run a gap analysis so that you can determine what compensating controls would be needed)
B. Terminate the outsourcing agreement. (it just has the potential to affect, so you wouldn't do this yet)
C. Transfer risk to the third party. (still just the potential to affect, so you wouldn't do this yet)
D. Conduct a gap analysis. (Find out what the gaps are between what is in place and what the new regulation is so that you can determine what to do)
